name: Narkhotik's Cate 2.0
description: Use with addon new tab override to choose which site to open on every new tab (like www.google.com). Allows you to change colors and background easily. Don't hesitate to send a FeedBack.
additional_info:
If you want to use a locally-stored image as background :
1. Use "Browse..."
OR
1. Select your image
2. Drag-and-drop the image to the browser
3. Copy its URL from the address bar
4. Paste that URL in the custom background URL
